33// Forward declarations for C++ builtins.
34#define FORWARD_DECLARE(Name) \
35 Address Builtin_##Name(int argc, Address* args, Isolate* isolate);
36BUILTIN_LIST_C(FORWARD_DECLARE)
37#undef FORWARD_DECLARE
38
39namespace {
40
41const int kBufferSize = 128 * KB;
42
43AssemblerOptions BuiltinAssemblerOptions(Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin) {
44 AssemblerOptions options = AssemblerOptions::Default(isolate);
45 CHECK(!options.isolate_independent_code);
46 CHECK(!options.collect_win64_unwind_info);
47
48#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
49 if (wasm::BuiltinLookup::IsWasmBuiltinId(builtin) ||
50 builtin == Builtin::kJSToWasmWrapper ||
51 builtin == Builtin::kJSToWasmHandleReturns ||
52 builtin == Builtin::kWasmToJsWrapperCSA) {
53 options.is_wasm = true;
54 }
55#endif
56 if (!isolate->IsGeneratingEmbeddedBuiltins()) {
57 return options;
58 }
59
60 const base::AddressRegion& code_region = isolate->heap()->code_region();
61 bool pc_relative_calls_fit_in_code_range =
62 !code_region.is_empty() &&
63 std::ceil(static_cast<float>(code_region.size() / MB)) <=
64 kMaxPCRelativeCodeRangeInMB;
65
66 // Mksnapshot ensures that the code range is small enough to guarantee that
67 // PC-relative call/jump instructions can be used for builtin to builtin
68 // calls/tail calls. The embedded builtins blob generator also ensures that.
69 // However, there are serializer tests, where we force isolate creation at
70 // runtime and at this point, Code space isn't restricted to a
71 // size s.t. PC-relative calls may be used. So, we fall back to an indirect
72 // mode.
73 options.use_pc_relative_calls_and_jumps_for_mksnapshot =
74 pc_relative_calls_fit_in_code_range;
75
76 options.builtin_call_jump_mode = BuiltinCallJumpMode::kForMksnapshot;
77 options.isolate_independent_code = true;
78 options.collect_win64_unwind_info = true;
79
80 if (builtin == Builtin::kInterpreterEntryTrampolineForProfiling) {
81 // InterpreterEntryTrampolineForProfiling must be generated in a position
82 // independent way because it might be necessary to create a copy of the
83 // builtin in the code space if the v8_flags.interpreted_frames_native_stack
84 // is enabled.
85 options.builtin_call_jump_mode = BuiltinCallJumpMode::kIndirect;
86 }
87
88 return options;
89}
90
91using MacroAssemblerGenerator = void (*)(MacroAssembler*);
92using CodeAssemblerGenerator = void (*)(compiler::CodeAssemblerState*);
93
94Handle<Code> BuildPlaceholder(Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin) {
95 HandleScope scope(isolate);
96 uint8_t buffer[kBufferSize];
97 MacroAssembler masm(isolate, CodeObjectRequired::kYes,
98 ExternalAssemblerBuffer(buffer, kBufferSize));
99 DCHECK(!masm.has_frame());
100 {
101 FrameScope frame_scope(&masm, StackFrame::NO_FRAME_TYPE);
102 // The contents of placeholder don't matter, as long as they don't create
103 // embedded constants or external references.
104 masm.Move(kJavaScriptCallCodeStartRegister, Smi::zero());
105 masm.Call(kJavaScriptCallCodeStartRegister);
106 }
107 CodeDesc desc;
108 masm.GetCode(isolate, &desc);
109 Handle<Code> code = Factory::CodeBuilder(isolate, desc, CodeKind::BUILTIN)
110 .set_self_reference(masm.CodeObject())
111 .set_builtin(builtin)
112 .Build();
113 return scope.CloseAndEscape(code);
114}
115
116V8_NOINLINE Tagged<Code> BuildWithMacroAssembler(
117 Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin, MacroAssemblerGenerator generator,
118 const char* s_name) {
119 HandleScope scope(isolate);
120 uint8_t buffer[kBufferSize];
121
122 MacroAssembler masm(isolate, BuiltinAssemblerOptions(isolate, builtin),
123 CodeObjectRequired::kYes,
124 ExternalAssemblerBuffer(buffer, kBufferSize));
125 masm.set_builtin(builtin);
126 DCHECK(!masm.has_frame());
127 masm.CodeEntry();
128 generator(&masm);
129
130 int handler_table_offset = 0;
131
132 // JSEntry builtins are a special case and need to generate a handler table.
133 DCHECK_EQ(Builtins::KindOf(Builtin::kJSEntry), Builtins::ASM);
134 DCHECK_EQ(Builtins::KindOf(Builtin::kJSConstructEntry), Builtins::ASM);
135 DCHECK_EQ(Builtins::KindOf(Builtin::kJSRunMicrotasksEntry), Builtins::ASM);
136 if (Builtins::IsJSEntryVariant(builtin)) {
137 handler_table_offset = HandlerTable::EmitReturnTableStart(&masm);
138 HandlerTable::EmitReturnEntry(
139 &masm, 0, isolate->builtins()->js_entry_handler_offset());
140 }
141#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY && (V8_TARGET_ARCH_X64 || V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM64 || \
142 V8_TARGET_ARCH_IA32 || V8_TARGET_ARCH_ARM)
143 if (builtin == Builtin::kWasmReturnPromiseOnSuspendAsm) {
144 handler_table_offset = HandlerTable::EmitReturnTableStart(&masm);
145 HandlerTable::EmitReturnEntry(
146 &masm, 0, isolate->builtins()->jspi_prompt_handler_offset());
147 }
148#endif
149
150 CodeDesc desc;
151 masm.GetCode(isolate->main_thread_local_isolate(), &desc,
152 MacroAssembler::kNoSafepointTable, handler_table_offset);
153
154 Handle<Code> code = Factory::CodeBuilder(isolate, desc, CodeKind::BUILTIN)
155 .set_self_reference(masm.CodeObject())
156 .set_builtin(builtin)
157 .Build();
158#if defined(V8_OS_WIN64)
159 isolate->SetBuiltinUnwindData(builtin, masm.GetUnwindInfo());
160#endif // V8_OS_WIN64
161 return *code;
162}
163
164Tagged<Code> BuildAdaptor(Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin,
165 Address builtin_address, const char* name) {
166 HandleScope scope(isolate);
167 uint8_t buffer[kBufferSize];
168 MacroAssembler masm(isolate, BuiltinAssemblerOptions(isolate, builtin),
169 CodeObjectRequired::kYes,
170 ExternalAssemblerBuffer(buffer, kBufferSize));
171 masm.set_builtin(builtin);
172 DCHECK(!masm.has_frame());
173 Builtins::Generate_Adaptor(&masm, builtin_address);
174 CodeDesc desc;
175 masm.GetCode(isolate, &desc);
176 Handle<Code> code = Factory::CodeBuilder(isolate, desc, CodeKind::BUILTIN)
177 .set_self_reference(masm.CodeObject())
178 .set_builtin(builtin)
179 .Build();
180 return *code;
181}
182
183// Builder for builtins implemented in TurboFan with JS linkage.
184V8_NOINLINE Tagged<Code> BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerJS(
185 Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin, CodeAssemblerGenerator generator,
186 int argc, const char* name) {
187 HandleScope scope(isolate);
188
189 Zone zone(isolate->allocator(), ZONE_NAME, kCompressGraphZone);
190 compiler::CodeAssemblerState state(isolate, &zone, argc, CodeKind::BUILTIN,
191 name, builtin);
192 generator(&state);
193 Handle<Code> code = compiler::CodeAssembler::GenerateCode(
194 &state, BuiltinAssemblerOptions(isolate, builtin),
195 ProfileDataFromFile::TryRead(name));
196 return *code;
197}
198
199// Builder for builtins implemented in TurboFan with CallStub linkage.
200V8_NOINLINE Tagged<Code> BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerCS(
201 Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin, CodeAssemblerGenerator generator,
202 CallDescriptors::Key interface_descriptor, const char* name) {
203 HandleScope scope(isolate);
204 Zone zone(isolate->allocator(), ZONE_NAME, kCompressGraphZone);
205 // The interface descriptor with given key must be initialized at this point
206 // and this construction just queries the details from the descriptors table.
207 CallInterfaceDescriptor descriptor(interface_descriptor);
208 // Ensure descriptor is already initialized.
209 DCHECK_LE(0, descriptor.GetRegisterParameterCount());
210 compiler::CodeAssemblerState state(isolate, &zone, descriptor,
211 CodeKind::BUILTIN, name, builtin);
212 generator(&state);
213 Handle<Code> code = compiler::CodeAssembler::GenerateCode(
214 &state, BuiltinAssemblerOptions(isolate, builtin),
215 ProfileDataFromFile::TryRead(name));
216 return *code;
217}
218
219} // anonymous namespace
220
221// static
222void SetupIsolateDelegate::AddBuiltin(Builtins* builtins, Builtin builtin,
223 Tagged<Code> code) {
224 DCHECK_EQ(builtin, code->builtin_id());
225 builtins->set_code(builtin, code);
226}
227
228// static
229void SetupIsolateDelegate::PopulateWithPlaceholders(Isolate* isolate) {
230 // Fill the builtins list with placeholders. References to these placeholder
231 // builtins are eventually replaced by the actual builtins. This is to
232 // support circular references between builtins.
233 Builtins* builtins = isolate->builtins();
234 HandleScope scope(isolate);
235 for (Builtin builtin = Builtins::kFirst; builtin <= Builtins::kLast;
236 ++builtin) {
237 Handle<Code> placeholder = BuildPlaceholder(isolate, builtin);
238 AddBuiltin(builtins, builtin, *placeholder);
239 }
240}
241
242// static
243void SetupIsolateDelegate::ReplacePlaceholders(Isolate* isolate) {
244 // Replace references from all builtin code objects to placeholders.
245 Builtins* builtins = isolate->builtins();
246 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
247 static const int kRelocMask =
248 RelocInfo::ModeMask(RelocInfo::CODE_TARGET) |
249 RelocInfo::ModeMask(RelocInfo::FULL_EMBEDDED_OBJECT) |
250 RelocInfo::ModeMask(RelocInfo::COMPRESSED_EMBEDDED_OBJECT) |
251 RelocInfo::ModeMask(RelocInfo::RELATIVE_CODE_TARGET);
252 PtrComprCageBase cage_base(isolate);
253 for (Builtin builtin = Builtins::kFirst; builtin <= Builtins::kLast;
254 ++builtin) {
255 Tagged<Code> code = builtins->code(builtin);
256 Tagged<InstructionStream> istream = code->instruction_stream();
257 WritableJitAllocation jit_allocation = ThreadIsolation::LookupJitAllocation(
258 istream.address(), istream->Size(),
259 ThreadIsolation::JitAllocationType::kInstructionStream);
260 bool flush_icache = false;
261 for (WritableRelocIterator it(jit_allocation, istream,
262 code->constant_pool(), kRelocMask);
263 !it.done(); it.next()) {
264 WritableRelocInfo* rinfo = it.rinfo();
265 if (RelocInfo::IsCodeTargetMode(rinfo->rmode())) {
266 Tagged<Code> target_code =
267 Code::FromTargetAddress(rinfo->target_address());
268 DCHECK_IMPLIES(
269 RelocInfo::IsRelativeCodeTarget(rinfo->rmode()),
270 Builtins::IsIsolateIndependent(target_code->builtin_id()));
271 if (!target_code->is_builtin()) continue;
272 Tagged<Code> new_target = builtins->code(target_code->builtin_id());
273 rinfo->set_target_address(istream, new_target->instruction_start(),
274 UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER, SKIP_ICACHE_FLUSH);
275 } else {
276 DCHECK(RelocInfo::IsEmbeddedObjectMode(rinfo->rmode()));
277 Tagged<Object> object = rinfo->target_object(cage_base);
278 if (!IsCode(object, cage_base)) continue;
279 Tagged<Code> target = Code::cast(object);
280 if (!target->is_builtin()) continue;
281 Tagged<Code> new_target = builtins->code(target->builtin_id());
282 rinfo->set_target_object(istream, new_target, UPDATE_WRITE_BARRIER,
283 SKIP_ICACHE_FLUSH);
284 }
285 flush_icache = true;
286 }
287 if (flush_icache) {
288 FlushInstructionCache(code->instruction_start(),
289 code->instruction_size());
290 }
291 }
292}
293
294namespace {
295
296V8_NOINLINE Tagged<Code> GenerateBytecodeHandler(
297 Isolate* isolate, Builtin builtin, interpreter::OperandScale operand_scale,
298 interpreter::Bytecode bytecode) {
299 DCHECK(interpreter::Bytecodes::BytecodeHasHandler(bytecode, operand_scale));
300 Handle<Code> code = interpreter::GenerateBytecodeHandler(
301 isolate, Builtins::name(builtin), bytecode, operand_scale, builtin,
302 BuiltinAssemblerOptions(isolate, builtin));
303 return *code;
304}
305
306} // namespace
307
308// static
309void SetupIsolateDelegate::SetupBuiltinsInternal(Isolate* isolate) {
310 Builtins* builtins = isolate->builtins();
311 DCHECK(!builtins->initialized_);
312
313 if (v8_flags.dump_builtins_hashes_to_file) {
314 // Create an empty file.
315 std::ofstream(v8_flags.dump_builtins_hashes_to_file, std::ios_base::trunc);
316 }
317
318 PopulateWithPlaceholders(isolate);
319
320 // Create a scope for the handles in the builtins.
321 HandleScope scope(isolate);
322
323 int index = 0;
324 Tagged<Code> code;
325#define BUILD_CPP(Name) \
326 code = BuildAdaptor(isolate, Builtin::k##Name, \
327 FUNCTION_ADDR(Builtin_##Name), #Name); \
328 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
329 index++;
330
331#define BUILD_TFJ(Name, Argc, ...) \
332 code = BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerJS( \
333 isolate, Builtin::k##Name, &Builtins::Generate_##Name, Argc, #Name); \
334 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
335 index++;
336
337#define BUILD_TFC(Name, InterfaceDescriptor) \
338 /* Return size is from the provided CallInterfaceDescriptor. */ \
339 code = BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerCS( \
340 isolate, Builtin::k##Name, &Builtins::Generate_##Name, \
341 CallDescriptors::InterfaceDescriptor, #Name); \
342 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
343 index++;
344
345#define BUILD_TFS(Name, ...) \
346 /* Return size for generic TF builtins (stub linkage) is always 1. */ \
347 code = BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerCS(isolate, Builtin::k##Name, \
348 &Builtins::Generate_##Name, \
349 CallDescriptors::Name, #Name); \
350 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
351 index++;
352
353#define BUILD_TFH(Name, InterfaceDescriptor) \
354 /* Return size for IC builtins/handlers is always 1. */ \
355 code = BuildWithCodeStubAssemblerCS( \
356 isolate, Builtin::k##Name, &Builtins::Generate_##Name, \
357 CallDescriptors::InterfaceDescriptor, #Name); \
358 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
359 index++;
360
361#define BUILD_BCH(Name, OperandScale, Bytecode) \
362 code = GenerateBytecodeHandler(isolate, Builtin::k##Name, OperandScale, \
363 Bytecode); \
364 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
365 index++;
366
367#define BUILD_ASM(Name, InterfaceDescriptor) \
368 code = BuildWithMacroAssembler(isolate, Builtin::k##Name, \
369 Builtins::Generate_##Name, #Name); \
370 AddBuiltin(builtins, Builtin::k##Name, code); \
371 index++;
372
373 BUILTIN_LIST(BUILD_CPP, BUILD_TFJ, BUILD_TFC, BUILD_TFS, BUILD_TFH, BUILD_BCH,
374 BUILD_ASM);
375
376#undef BUILD_CPP
377#undef BUILD_TFJ
378#undef BUILD_TFC
379#undef BUILD_TFS
380#undef BUILD_TFH
381#undef BUILD_BCH
382#undef BUILD_ASM
383 CHECK_EQ(Builtins::kBuiltinCount, index);
384
385 ReplacePlaceholders(isolate);
386
387 builtins->MarkInitialized();
388}
389
390} // namespace internal
391} // namespace v8
